title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using the new class wizard, the context for nested classes is not getting set correctly.
EB: In build 20011106, with a .java file open in the editor, when the new class button is clicked, the 'Enclosing Type' field is blank. It should default to the current type in the editor.
SR:
1. Open a .java file in the editor in build 20011106.
2. Click on the new class button.
3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' field.
